recipe.notes: **UNTRIED** I have no clue where this recipe comes from. Could be my mom's collection but I think I'd be a lot more excited about it if it were. I always associated marinated mushrooms with my gramma's guests coming over as a child. My gramma was from an entirely different era in Sacramento history than my own and I think this may have been a customary bring-along among their set. "Make not the marinated mushrooms in the summertime, for they shall be Brought Along." A good policy.
recipe.name: Marinated Mushrooms
recipe.preparation: Mix oil, vinegar and seasonings. Toss gently with mushrooms and onions and marinate for 4 to 6 hours.
